name: Tentazione dell'Adeptus deliziosa
desc: A complex, famous type of Liyue cuisine. This dish is a rare and exquisite mix of both land and sea, combining countless delicious delicacies in one flavor-filled pot. Each mouthful is a moment to remember â€” it's even irresistible enough to entice the adepti down from their celestial abode.

value.text: Increases all party members' ATK by 372 and CRIT Rate by 12% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
